backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and CRUD APIs for gallery, messages, timeline, surprises, dedication, and user profiles with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two publishing‑related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of many frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/DraftReviewSumma: Shows counts of draft gallery items and messages plus last-loaded time using query hooks.
Generic drag-and-drop reorderable list component that updates order on drag end.
frontend/src/components/EditGuard.tsx: Protects edit pages by requiring login and user profile setup before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/editors/Dedicati: Editor for viewing and updating the final dedication title and message with save validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/editors/GalleryE: Editor for adding, deleting, and reordering gallery photos with caption input and file upload support.
frontend/src/components/editors/Interact: Editor for managing interactive surprise config, including quiz questions and flip cards with validation and saving.
frontend/src/components/editors/LoveMess: Editor to add, edit, delete, and reorder love messages with support for previews and full text.
frontend/src/components/editors/Timeline: Editor for creating, deleting, and reordering timeline milestones with date, text, and optional photo upload.
frontend/src/components/FlipCard.tsx: Interactive flip card with 3D front/back rotation on click.
Image carousel with navigation buttons and thumbnail selectors.
frontend/src/components/HeartParticles.t: Renders floating animated heart particles positioned randomly.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/LoveQuiz.tsx: Interactive multi‑question quiz with scoring, answer validation, and result display.
frontend/src/components/MessageEnvelopeC: Expandable card that opens a modal to display a full love message.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/PublishingCallou: Alert explaining publishing steps with a copyable preset message and fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with background pattern, navigation, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive site navigation bar with links, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseReveal.t: Component that toggles between a surprise button and a revealed heartfelt message with animations.
frontend/src/components/TimelineMileston: Displays a timeline milestone with date, title, expandable details, and optional photo, supporting alternating layout.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSurface: Simple wrapper component providing a styled card-like surface around children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutations for editing gallery items, love messages, timeline milestones, and related content through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching user profiles, gallery items, messages, timeline data, surprises, and dedications via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration with custom color variables, animations, and theme styles for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/EditContentPage.tsx: Page that wraps editors in tabs for managing gallery, messages, timeline, dedication, and surprise content with edit safeguards.
frontend/src/pages/FinalDedicationPage.t: Displays the final dedication content with loading state handling and styled presentation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, heart animations, and quick navigation cards linking to all major site sections.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveSurprisePa: Displays interactive surprise features including a reveal component, quiz, and flip cards driven by fetched config data.
frontend/src/pages/LoveMessagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays sorted love messages as envelope cards, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesGalleryPage.t: Loads and sorts gallery items, showing either a carousel of memories or an empty-state placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/TimelinePage.tsx: Retrieves and chronologically displays timeline milestones in a vertical timeline layout with loading and empty handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage-based fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine-themed website.
